SELECT /* rem4080_s01 */ COMM_NO, C.CD_NM AS COMM_NM ,NVL(SUM(DECODE(TRADE_DAY, '2', CNT)),0) AS CNT_2 ,NVL(SUM(DECODE(TRADE_DAY, '3', CNT)),0) AS CNT_3 ,NVL(SUM(DECODE(TRADE_DAY, '4', CNT)),0) AS CNT_4 ,NVL(SUM(DECODE(TRADE_DAY, '5', CNT)),0) AS CNT_5 ,NVL(SUM(DECODE(TRADE_DAY, '6', CNT)),0) AS CNT_6 ,NVL(SUM(DECODE(TRADE_DAY, '7', CNT)),0) AS CNT_7 ,NVL(SUM(DECODE(TRADE_DAY, '1', CNT)),0) AS CNT_1 ,NVL(SUM(CNT),0) AS CNT_SUM FROM ( SELECT TRADE_DATE, COMM_NO, CASE WHEN COMM_NO='00' THEN DECODE(?,'Y',CNT,0) ELSE CNT END AS CNT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TRADE_DATE,'yyyymmdd'), 'd') AS TRADE_DAY FROM TBRC_T_TRADE_SUM --현금입장인원 데이터가 없음 WHERE TRADE_DATE BETWEEN ? AND ?
--광명입장권 UNION ALL SELECT TRADE_DATE, '00', (SUM(CNT) - SUM(DECODE(?,'Y',K_CNT,0))) AS CNT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TRADE_DATE,'yyyymmdd'), 'd') AS TRADE_DAY FROM TBRC_T_TRADE_RACE_SUM WHERE TRADE_DATE BETWEEN ? AND ? AND COMM_NO IN ('00', '98') AND 'N' = ? GROUP BY TRADE_DATE
--미사리입장권 UNION ALL SELECT TRADE_DATE, '98', CNT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TRADE_DATE,'yyyymmdd'), 'd') AS TRADE_DAY FROM TBRC_T_TRADE_MSR_SUM WHERE TRADE_DATE BETWEEN ? AND ? AND 'N' = ? )X ,TBRK_SPEC_CD C ,(SELECT RACE_DAY, MIN(MEET_CD) AS MEET_CD FROM VW_SDL_INFO GROUP BY RACE_DAY) I ,( SELECT RACE_DAY ,C.CD AS BRNC_CD ,C.CD_NM AS COMM_NM FROM (SELECT RACE_DAY, MIN(MEET_CD) AS MEET_CD FROM VW_SDL_INFO GROUP BY RACE_DAY) S, TBRK_SPEC_CD C WHERE 1=1 --AND S.MEET_CD IN ('001','003') --교차만 시행하는 경우 땜시(2014.8.8) AND C.GRP_CD = '018' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.CD_TERM4 LIKE DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '001','1','%')||DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '003','1','%') AND S.MEET_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND S.RACE_DAY BETWEEN ? AND ? ) S WHERE 1=1 AND X.TRADE_DATE = I.RACE_DAY --AND I.MEET_CD IN ('001','003') AND X.TRADE_DATE = S.RACE_DAY AND X.COMM_NO = S.BRNC_CD AND I.MEET_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND X.COMM_NO = C.CD(+) AND C.GRP_CD(+) = '018' GROUP BY COMM_NO, C.CD_NM ORDER BY 1

WITH STAY_MANA AS( /* rem4080_s02 */ SELECT RACE_NO, SUM(ENT_PRSN_NUM) TOT_PRSN_NUM, SUM(DECODE(DNUM,'2',ENT_PRSN_NUM)) MON_PRSN_NUM , SUM(DECODE(DNUM,'3',ENT_PRSN_NUM)) TUE_PRSN_NUM , SUM(DECODE(DNUM,'4',ENT_PRSN_NUM)) WEN_PRSN_NUM , SUM(DECODE(DNUM,'5',ENT_PRSN_NUM)) THU_PRSN_NUM , SUM(DECODE(DNUM,'6',ENT_PRSN_NUM)) FRI_PRSN_NUM , SUM(DECODE(DNUM,'7',ENT_PRSN_NUM)) SAT_PRSN_NUM , SUM(DECODE(DNUM,'1',ENT_PRSN_NUM)) SUN_PRSN_NUM , COUNT(DISTINCT DNUM) DAYCNT FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TRADE_DATE, COMM_NO, MEET_CD, DECODE(RACE_NO,0,1,RACE_NO) RACE_NO, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TRADE_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'D') DNUM, SUM(CNT) + SUM(CASE WHEN COMM_NO = '00' AND CARD_USER_TYPE = '4' AND ? = 'Y' THEN K_CNT ELSE 0 END) --광명 현금입장권 포함 + SUM(CASE WHEN COMM_NO = '98' AND CARD_USER_TYPE = '4' AND ? = 'Y' THEN K_CNT ELSE 0 END) --미사리 현금입장권 포함 AS ENT_PRSN_NUM FROM TBRC_T_TRADE_RACE_SUM --현금입장인원 데이터가 포함 WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY TRADE_DATE, COMM_NO, MEET_CD, DECODE(RACE_NO,0,1,RACE_NO), TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TRADE_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'D') ) T ,( SELECT RACE_DAY ,C.CD AS BRNC_CD ,C.CD_NM AS COMM_NM FROM (SELECT RACE_DAY, MIN(MEET_CD) AS MEET_CD FROM VW_SDL_INFO GROUP BY RACE_DAY) S, TBRK_SPEC_CD C WHERE 1=1 AND C.GRP_CD = '018' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.CD_TERM4 LIKE DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '001','1','%')||DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '003','1','%') AND S.MEET_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND S.RACE_DAY BETWEEN ? AND ? ) S WHERE T.TRADE_DATE >= ? AND T.TRADE_DATE <= ? AND T.MEET_CD LIKE ? AND T.COMM_NO LIKE ?||'%' AND T.TRADE_DATE = S.RACE_DAY AND T.COMM_NO = S.BRNC_CD --GROUP BY DECODE(RACE_NO,0,1,RACE_NO) ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TRADE_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'D') ) E GROUP BY E.RACE_NO ) SELECT A.RACE_NO ,A.TOT_PRSN_NUM ,ROUND(DECODE(A.DAYCNT,0,0, A.TOT_PRSN_NUM/A.DAYCNT)) DAVG ,A.MON_PRSN_NUM ,A.TUE_PRSN_NUM ,A.WEN_PRSN_NUM ,A.THU_PRSN_NUM ,A.FRI_PRSN_NUM ,A.SAT_PRSN_NUM ,A.SUN_PRSN_NUM FROM STAY_MANA A ORDER BY A.RACE_NO

WITH X AS /* rem4080_s03 */ ( SELECT A.TMS ,A.RACE_NO ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT ,COUNT(DISTINCT RACE_NO) CT FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.TRADE_DATE, T.COMM_NO, T.MEET_CD, V.TMS, DECODE(T.RACE_NO,0,1,T.RACE_NO) RACE_NO, SUM(T.CNT) + SUM(CASE WHEN COMM_NO = '00' AND CARD_USER_TYPE = '4' AND ? = 'Y' THEN K_CNT ELSE 0 END) --광명 현금입장권 포함 + SUM(CASE WHEN COMM_NO = '98' AND CARD_USER_TYPE = '4' AND ? = 'Y' THEN K_CNT ELSE 0 END) --미사리 현금입장권 포함 AS CNT FROM TBRC_T_TRADE_RACE_SUM T, VW_SDL_INFO V WHERE 1 = 1 AND T.TRADE_DATE = V.RACE_DAY AND V.MEET_CD IN ('001','003') GROUP BY T.TRADE_DATE, T.COMM_NO, T.MEET_CD, V.TMS, DECODE(T.RACE_NO,0,1,T.RACE_NO)
) T ,( SELECT RACE_DAY ,C.CD AS BRNC_CD ,C.CD_NM AS COMM_NM FROM (SELECT RACE_DAY, MIN(MEET_CD) AS MEET_CD FROM VW_SDL_INFO GROUP BY RACE_DAY) S, TBRK_SPEC_CD C WHERE 1=1 --AND S.MEET_CD IN ('001','003') AND C.GRP_CD = '018' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.CD_TERM4 LIKE DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '001','1','%')||DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '003','1','%') AND S.MEET_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND S.RACE_DAY BETWEEN ? AND ? ) S WHERE T.MEET_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND TRADE_DATE BETWEEN ? AND ? AND COMM_NO LIKE ?||'%' AND T.TRADE_DATE = S.RACE_DAY AND T.COMM_NO = S.BRNC_CD ) A WHERE A.CNT > 0 GROUP BY A.TMS, A.RACE_NO ) SELECT TMS, CUM1, CUM2, CUM3, CUM4, CUM5, CUM6, CUM7, CUM8, CUM9, CUM10, CUM11, CUM12, CUM13, CUM14, CUM15, CUM16, CUM17, CUM18, SUM(CUM1+CUM2+CUM3+CUM4+CUM5+CUM6+CUM7+CUM8+CUM9+CUM10+CUM11+CUM12+CUM13+CUM14+CUM15+CUM16+CUM17+CUM18) AS CUM_SUM, CUM_AVG FROM ( SELECT TMS ,SUM(DECODE(RACE_NO,1,CNT,0)) AS CUM1 ,SUM(DECODE(RACE_NO,2,CNT,0)) AS CUM2 ,SUM(DECODE(RACE_NO,3,CNT,0)) AS CUM3 ,SUM(DECODE(RACE_NO,4,CNT,0)) AS CUM4 ,SUM(DECODE(RACE_NO,5,CNT,0)) AS CUM5 ,SUM(DECODE(RACE_NO,6,CNT,0)) AS CUM6 ,SUM(DECODE(RACE_NO,7,CNT,0)) AS CUM7 ,SUM(DECODE(RACE_NO,8,CNT,0)) AS CUM8 ,SUM(DECODE(RACE_NO,9,CNT,0)) AS CUM9 ,SUM(DECODE(RACE_NO,10,CNT,0)) AS CUM10 ,SUM(DECODE(RACE_NO,11,CNT,0)) AS CUM11 ,SUM(DECODE(RACE_NO,12,CNT,0)) AS CUM12 ,SUM(DECODE(RACE_NO,13,CNT,0)) AS CUM13 ,SUM(DECODE(RACE_NO,14,CNT,0)) AS CUM14 ,SUM(DECODE(RACE_NO,15,CNT,0)) AS CUM15 ,SUM(DECODE(RACE_NO,16,CNT,0)) AS CUM16 ,SUM(DECODE(RACE_NO,17,CNT,0)) AS CUM17 ,SUM(DECODE(RACE_NO,18,CNT,0)) AS CUM18 ,ROUND(SUM(CNT)/SUM(CT)) AS CUM_AVG FROM X GROUP BY TMS ) GROUP BY TMS, CUM1, CUM2, CUM3, CUM4, CUM5, CUM6, CUM7, CUM8, CUM9, CUM10, CUM11, CUM12, CUM13, CUM14, CUM15, CUM16, CUM17, CUM18, CUM_AVG ORDER BY 1

SELECT /* rem4080_s04 */ TMS AS COMM_NM ,NVL(SUM(DECODE(TRADE_DAY, '2', CNT)),0) AS CNT_2 ,NVL(SUM(DECODE(TRADE_DAY, '3', CNT)),0) AS CNT_3 ,NVL(SUM(DECODE(TRADE_DAY, '4', CNT)),0) AS CNT_4 ,NVL(SUM(DECODE(TRADE_DAY, '5', CNT)),0) AS CNT_5 ,NVL(SUM(DECODE(TRADE_DAY, '6', CNT)),0) AS CNT_6 ,NVL(SUM(DECODE(TRADE_DAY, '7', CNT)),0) AS CNT_7 ,NVL(SUM(DECODE(TRADE_DAY, '1', CNT)),0) AS CNT_1 ,NVL(SUM(CNT),0) AS CNT_SUM FROM ( SELECT TRADE_DATE, COMM_NO, --CNT, CASE WHEN COMM_NO='00' THEN DECODE(?,'Y',CNT,0) ELSE CNT END AS CNT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TRADE_DATE,'yyyymmdd'), 'd') AS TRADE_DAY FROM TBRC_T_TRADE_SUM WHERE TRADE_DATE BETWEEN ? AND ?
--광명입장권 UNION ALL --SELECT TRADE_DATE, '00', CNT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TRADE_DATE,'yyyymmdd'), 'd') AS TRADE_DAY --FROM TBRC_T_TRADE_KM_SUM --WHERE TRADE_DATE BETWEEN ? AND ? --AND '1' = ?
SELECT TRADE_DATE, '00', (SUM(CNT) - SUM(DECODE(?,'Y',K_CNT,0))) AS CNT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TRADE_DATE,'yyyymmdd'), 'd') AS TRADE_DAY FROM TBRC_T_TRADE_RACE_SUM WHERE TRADE_DATE BETWEEN ? AND ? AND COMM_NO = '00' AND 'N' = ? GROUP BY TRADE_DATE
--지정좌석실 UNION ALL SELECT ISSUE_DT ,COMM_NO ,COUNT(*) AS CNT ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ISSUE_DT,'yyyymmdd'),'d') FROM TBRC_FS_TRADE WHERE 1=1 AND COMM_NO IN ('21','26') AND ISSUE_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? AND 'N' = ? GROUP BY ISSUE_DT, COMM_NO --미사리입장권 UNION ALL SELECT TRADE_DATE, '98', CNT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TRADE_DATE,'yyyymmdd'), 'd') AS TRADE_DAY FROM TBRC_T_TRADE_MSR_SUM WHERE TRADE_DATE BETWEEN ? AND ? AND 'N' = ? ) X ,( SELECT RACE_DAY ,C.CD AS BRNC_CD ,C.CD_NM AS COMM_NM ,S.MEET_CD ,S.TMS FROM VW_SDL_INFO S, TBRK_SPEC_CD C WHERE 1=1 AND S.MEET_CD IN ('001','003') AND C.GRP_CD = '018' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.CD_TERM4 LIKE DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '001','1','%')||DECODE(S.MEET_CD, '003','1','%') AND S.MEET_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND S.RACE_DAY BETWEEN ? AND ? ) S WHERE 1=1 AND X.TRADE_DATE = S.RACE_DAY AND S.MEET_CD IN ('001','003') AND X.COMM_NO = S.BRNC_CD AND S.MEET_CD LIKE ?||'%' GROUP BY TMS ORDER BY 1
